name: Seeking The Beast II
description:
I made a sequel to my first game ever "Seeking The Beast" from 2008. You are trapped in a valley where a Beast has gone wild. It created havoc and it has to be slain. There is also a speedrun timer(My best is 5:28 Min)

Let me know what you think, and have a great day!

Controls: 

C to Talk And Okay Stuff (Ingame O)

X to Attack or go Back (Ingame X)
